QuestData.Title: Wayward Child
QuestData.Description: One of my children is not with me, $n.$B$BHe stayed behind with the Twilight's Hammer at the Stonecore deep within the Temple of Earth.$B$BI sent my other children to free him from the dark magic that was surely keeping him from returning here, but... no such magic was placed upon him.$B$BGo into the Stonecore and destroy Ozruk. He must be reclaimed by the earth.
